mapper.select: select id, password, name, sex, phone, age, repair_num from worker where name like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and flag != 0
select id, password, name, sex, phone, age, repair_num from worker where id = #{id} limit 1
select id, password, name, sex, age, phone, flag, repair_num from worker order by repair_num asc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into worker(id, password, name, sex, age, phone) value (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update worker set password =#{password}, name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, age=#{age}, phone=#{phone}, repair_num=#{repairNum} where id = #{id}
